languages.text: Комендант делится тревожными вестями. Аванпост во многом зависит от поставок с основных миров Винтерскейлов, однако вот уже два корабля не прибыли в назначенный срок. У местных нет своего астропата, и выяснить причину задержки или запросить помощь комендант не может.

traits.locale_text: Комендант делится тревожными вестями. Аванпост во многом зависит от поставок из основных миров Винтерскейлов, однако вот уже два корабля не прибыли в назначенный срок. У них нет своего астропата, и выяснить причину задержки и запросить помощь комендант не может.

languages.text: The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.
languages.original_text: Комендант делится тревожными вестями. Аванпост во многом зависит от поставок с основных миров Винтерскейлов, однако вот уже два корабля не прибыли в назначенный срок. У местных нет своего астропата, и выяснить причину задержки или запросить помощь комендант не может.

traits.locale_text: The warden shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependant on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot find out the cause of the delays or request aid.

The locals do not have an astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot find out the cause of the delays or request aid.

The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.

The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.

The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.

languages.text: 管理者告知了令人不安的消息。这个前哨站非常依赖温特斯凯尔主要世界运输来的货物，但已经有两艘运输船未能按时抵达。由于当地人没有自己的星语者，管理者既无法确定延误的原因，也无法发出求助信号。
languages.original_text: The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.

traits.locale_text: 管理者告知了令人不安的消息。这个前哨站非常依赖温特斯凯尔主要世界运输来的货物，但已经有两艘运输船未能按时抵达。由于当地人没有自己的星语者，管理者既无法确定延误的原因，也无法发出求助信号。

languages.text: カストーディアンが驚くべきニュースを伝えてきた。この前哨基地は、ウィンタースケールの中核となる惑星からのさまざまな配送に大きく依存しているが、予定を外れ、まだ現れていない船がすでに2隻ある。地元には感応通信官がいないため、カストーディアンは遅れの原因を特定することも、援助を要請することもできない。
languages.original_text: The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.

traits.locale_text: カストーディアンが驚くべきニュースを伝えてきた。この前哨基地は、ウィンタースケールの中核となる惑星からのさまざまな配送に大きく依存しているが、予定を外れ、まだ現れていない船がすでに2隻ある。地元には感応通信官がいないため、カストーディアンは遅れの原因を特定することも、援助を要請することもできない。

languages.text: El custodio comparte noticias alarmantes. El puesto de avanzada depende en gran medida de varias entregas de los mundos centrales de Winterscale, pero dos naves no han llegado a tiempo. Los lugareños no disponen de ningún Astrópata, por lo que el custodio no puede determinar la causa de los retrasos ni solicitar ayuda.
languages.original_text: The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.

traits.locale_text: El custodio comparte noticias alarmantes. El puesto de avanzada depende en gran medida de varias entregas de los mundos centrales de Winterscale, pero dos naves no han llegado a tiempo. Los lugareños no disponen de ningún Astrópata, por lo que el custodio no puede determinar la causa de los retrasos ni solicitar ayuda.

languages.text: Der Hüter hat beunruhigende Neuigkeiten. Der Außenposten ist stark von verschiedenen Lieferungen von den Kernwelten der Winterzunders abhängig, doch die letzten zwei Schiffe sind nicht wie geplant eingetroffen. Die Einheimischen haben keinen eigenen Astropathen, der Hüter kann also die Ursache für die Verzögerungen nicht feststellen und keine Hilfe anfordern.
languages.original_text: The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.

traits.locale_text: Der Hüter hat beunruhigende Neuigkeiten. Der Außenposten ist stark von verschiedenen Lieferungen von den Kernwelten der Winterzunders abhängig, doch die letzten zwei Schiffe sind nicht wie geplant eingetroffen. Die Einheimischen haben keinen eigenen Astropathen, der Hüter kann also die Ursache für die Verzögerungen nicht feststellen und keine Hilfe anfordern.

languages.text: Les nouvelles ne sont pas bonnes. L'avant-poste dépend entièrement des livraisons en provenance des mondes-capitales des Winterscale, mais deux vaisseaux de ravitaillement accusent déjà du retard. À défaut d'astropathe, le gardien ne peut ni déterminer la cause du problème ni envoyer d'appel de détresse.
languages.original_text: The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.

L'avant-poste dépend entièrement des livraisons en provenance des mondes-capitales des Winterscale, mais deux vaisseaux de ravitaillement accusent déjà du retard. À défaut d'astropathe, le gardien ne peut ni déterminer la cause du problème ni envoyer d'appel de détresse.

languages.text: Sorumlunun anlattıkları insanı endişelendirecek türden. Bu karakol merkezî Winterscale dünyalarından gelen çeşitli teslimatlara iyice bel bağlamış hâlde ancak şimdiden gemilerden ikisi zamanında gelememiş. Karakolda Astropat da olmadığı için ne bu gecikmelerin sebebi öğrenilebiliyor ne de yardım istenebiliyor.
languages.original_text: The custodian shares alarming news. The outpost is highly dependent on various deliveries from the core Winterscale worlds, but two ships have already failed to arrive on schedule. The locals do not have an Astropath of their own, so the custodian cannot determine the cause of the delays or request aid.
